content:
My favorite songs are "My Shot" and "Helpless". I love how the lyrics are so clever and the rhythms are so catchy. I've been humming them nonstop for days! I also appreciate how the songs tell the story of Alexander Hamilton's life, from his early days as an immigrant to his later years as a statesman. The way the music and lyrics convey his ambition, passion, and flaws is really compelling.

I have thought about seeing the show live, actually! I've heard it's an incredible experience, and I'd love to see the choreography and performances up close. I've been looking into tickets, but they're a bit pricey. Maybe I'll splurge and treat myself to a special night out.

What about you? Have you seen Hamilton live, or is it on your bucket list?
